Description: Ostracon, small fragment of a red-pottery vessel, the fabric is partially grey in section, the interior is covered with a grey-coloured wash and remains of three lines of Coptic text written in black ink, the exterior is covered with a red-brown slip and remains of five lines of Coptic text written in black ink.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394591) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394591)
